forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the night gently wanes in Downtown San Francisco, a soft layer of clouds reflects the subdued glow of the city lights, hinting at a tranquil overnight ambiance. The air is comfortably mild, wrapping around you like a familiar embrace, whispering promises of a pleasant day ahead. Dawn will break to reveal mostly sunny skies, coaxing the temperature upward, inviting residents to reclaim the outdoors after the cloistered night. By afternoon, the sun will warm the streets to a lively 69 degrees, while a cool breeze will dance through the avenues, invigorating even the most languid of souls.

Fog has lingered at the fringes, possibly enshrouding the Golden Gate Bridge, yet it does little to darken the mood of the day. Instead, it creates an alluring juxtaposition against the brightening sky, reminding all that the marine layer is but a fleeting visitor in this coastal paradise. Attire for the day could comfortably include a light sweater or jacket for the breezy morning, giving way to soft layers that can easily be shed as the sun’s warmth begins to dominate the scene. With this pleasant weather, a walk along the waterfront, a visit to a local café, or perhaps a moment spent at one of the sprawling parks could weave a day of understated joy—perfect for savoring the gentle rhythm of life in this vibrant city.
